oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Losses of sediment and phosphorus through subsurface drains in a clayey field in southern Finland
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Paasonen-Kivekäs, Maija
Koivusalo, Harri
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Air and water emissions
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Seasonal and short-term transport of eroded soil (TSS), total phosphorus (total P) and dissolved orthophosphate phosphorus (DP) via tile drains were studied using on-farm monitoring data from a clayey field under cereal cultivation.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Paasonen-Kivekäs, Maija and Koivusalo, Harri (2006) Losses of sediment and phosphorus through subsurface drains in a clayey field in southern Finland. In: Transport and retention of pollutants from different production systems : NJF seminar 373, Nordic Association of Agricultural Scientists, 2 (5), NJF Report, pp. 95-100.
